humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest invasive tumor focus, which is 1.5 cm. According to the rules provided, a T1 tumor is 2 cm or less in size. Furthermore, the report specifies that this is a T1c tumor, which corresponds to a tumor size between 1.1 and 2 cm. Therefore, the predicted T stage is T1c.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there are two foci of infiltrating ductal carcinoma, with the largest focus being 1.5 cm. The T stage is determined by the size of the largest focus, so in this case, it would be T1c (1.1 to 2 cm). This is confirmed in the 'Case Synopsis' section of the report.
